subject: Hiking
Weather
Documentary Films and Programs
Robberies and Thefts
Walking
lead_paragraph: Scott Williamson, the only person known to have completed the 5,300-mile hike up and down the length of the Pacific Crest Trail in a single year, is at it again.
snippet: Scott Williamson, the only person known to have completed the 5,300-mile hike up and down the length of the Pacific Crest Trail in a single year, is at it again.
